Class LootingBonusListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.codisimus.plugins.phatloots.listeners.LootingBonusListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.bukkit.event.Listener

    public class LootingBonusListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.bukkit.event.Listener
    Applies looting bonuses based on Player permissions

    Codisimus

      • getLootingBonusFromPerms

        public double getLootingBonusFromPerms(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Calculates the looting bonus for the given Player based on permissions
        Parameters:
        player - The Player who may or may not have bonus permission nodes
        Returns:
        The accumulative double value of all permission looting bonuses
